title: What have Center for Policy Alternatives, National Peace Council and Transparency International done with Rs.600million given to them?
content: – by Shenali Waduge – When foreign nations like Canada, Germany, Norway, Switzerland, Netherlands, the EU and USA collaborate to donate 3 NGOs that are often quoted on international arena as the mouthpieces for “democracy”, “transparency” and “truth” our next question unanswered thus far is what have these organizations being doing with Rs.600million given…
